QuestData.Title: Superior Programming
QuestData.Description:
Phalynx listen to their orders. Never disobey!
Larions are wild beasts. Can attack. Could eat a steward, probably!
Untamed larion lives close. Has chased many stewards, very scary! Please take care of it.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: A fearsome larion, Leonid has been rumored to enjoy the occasional steward snack.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Leonid in the Hall of Beasts.
QuestData.RewardText: Can be at peace, no wild larion to eat me. Hoo...
